reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 170/20: ZONING ORDER - CITY OF TORONTO
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. This Order applies to lands in the City of Toronto, in the Province of Ontario, being the lands described as Part Lots 3 and 4, Concession 2, as identified by Property Identification Number 10368-0833 (LT) registered in the Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Toronto (No. 80).
content.raw_html: 1. This Order applies to lands in the City of Toronto, in the Province of Ontario, being the lands described as Part Lots 3 and 4, Concession 2, as identified by Property Identification Number 10368-0833 (LT) registered in the Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Toronto (No. 80).

content.content: 2. Despite clause 64.44 (1) (b) of the former City of North York Zoning By-law No. 7625, as amended, the maximum gross floor area of all buildings on the lands described in section 1 of this Regulation is 275,705 square metres. O. Reg. 170/20, s. 2; O. Reg. 6/23, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 2. Despite clause 64.44 (1) (b) of the former City of North York Zoning By-law No. 7625, as amended, the maximum gross floor area of all buildings on the lands described in section 1 of this Regulation is 275,705 square metres. O. Reg. 170/20, s. 2; O. Reg. 6/23, s. 1.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
